title: UK weather: heat health warnings issued across England
description: Health agency says hot weather could have significant impact as temperatures soar to mid-30s celsius
content:
Amber heat health warnings have been issued across swaths of England as temperatures rise. Parts of the UK are forecast to be hotter than Bali this week, with thermometer readings likely to hit the mid-30s celsius on Tuesday.

title: Crystal Palace to stay in Conference League after losing appeal at Cas
description: Crystal Palace have lost their appeal at the court of arbitration for sport against their demotion to the Conference League
content: Crystal Palace have lost their appeal against demotion from the Europa League and will take their place in the Conference League. The court of arbitration for sport confirmed on Monday that the FA Cup winners were unsuccessful in overturning the deci... [3004 chars]

title: Jack Grealish agrees to join Everton on season’s loan from Manchester City
description: Jack Grealish is poised to sign for Everton on loan after agreeing to leave Manchester City in an attempt to revive his stalled career
content:
Jack Grealish is poised to sign for Everton on loan after agreeing to leave Manchester City in an attempt to revive his stalled career.

title: Three children arrested on suspicion of murder
description: A 16-year-old girl and two boys, aged 14 and 15, are in police custody after an incident on Sunday.
content:
Three children have been arrested on suspicion of murder after a man was found dead in Leysdown-on-Sea on the Isle of Sheppey, Kent Police has said.

title: Girl, 16, and two teenage boys arrested on suspicion of murder after death of man on Isle of Sheppey
description: Kent Police said officers were called to reports of an altercation involving a small group of people in Leysdown-on-Sea on the Isle of Sheppey.
content:
Three teenagers have been arrested following the death of a man in Kent.
Officers attended an incident in the seaside resort of Leysdown-on-Sea, on the Isle of Sheppey, shortly after 7pm on Sunday.
